title: [Medicine] A team of investigators discovered that six drugs previously approved by the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for other indications could be repurposed to treat or prevent COVID-19

[Epidemiology] Research shows SARS-CoV-2-related coronaviruses are circulating in animals as far away as Thailand. High levels of neutralising antibodies against the virus were present in bats and pangolins. Southeast Asia with its large and diverse bat populations may be a more likely hotspot for such viruses.
